    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          <identifier>

            <entry>merli/2441</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Comment dit-on un ou une?</string>
            <string language="en">When do you use "un" or "une"?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wann benutzen Sie "un" oder "une"?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Quand utilisez-vous l'"un" ou l'"une" ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Quando você usa o "un" ou o "une"?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Quando usate "l'ONU" o "il une"?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πότε χρησιμοποιείτε "τα Η.Ε" ή "une";</string>
          </title>
          <language>fr</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Miniunitat didàctica (MUD) interactiva sobre l'ús dels articles indeterminats masculí "un" i femení "une" amb objectes senzills del material escolar utilitzat per l'alumnat. Conté exercicis de pràctica i d'autoavaluació amb so.</string>
            <string language="en">Interactive mini teaching unit (MUD) on the use of the indefinite articles "un" (masculine) and "une" (feminine) with simple classroom objects used by the pupils. It includes practice and self-assessment exercises with aural backup.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">exercici</string>
            <string language="en">exercise</string>
            <string language="es">ejercicio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">gramàtica</string>
            <string language="en">grammar</string>
            <string language="es">gramática</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">material interactiu</string>
            <string language="en">interactive material</string>
            <string language="es">material interactivo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">expressió oral</string>
            <string language="en">oral expression</string>
            <string language="es">expresión oral</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">lectura</string>
            <string language="en">reading</string>
            <string language="es">lectura</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktive unterrichtende Minimaßeinheit (SCHLAMM) auf 
dem Gebrauch von den unbestimmten Artikeln "un" (männlich) und "dem 
une" (weiblich) mit den einfachen Klassenzimmernachrichten benutzt 
durch die Pupillen. Es schließt Praxis- und 
Selbstbewertungsübungen mit Ohrenbackup ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mini unité d'enseignement interactive (BOUE) sur 
l'utilisation des articles indéfinis "un" (masculine) et du l'"une" 
(féminin) avec les objets simples de salle de classe employés par 
les pupilles. Elle inclut la pratique et les exercices de 
art de l'auto-portrait-assessment avec la sauvegarde auditive.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Unidade ensinando mini interativa (LAMA) no uso dos 
artigos indefinidos "un" (masculine) e do "une" (feminine) com os 
objetos simples da sala de aula usados pelas pupilas. Inclui 
exercícios da prática e do self-assessment com apoio aural.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mini unità d'istruzione interattiva (FANGO) sull'uso 
degli articoli indefiniti "ONU" (maschile) e "del une" (femminile) con
gli oggetti semplici dell'aula usati dalle pupille. Include le 
esercitazioni di valutazione di se stesso e di pratica con recupero 
sonoro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλογική μίνι μονάδα διδασκαλίας (ΛΑΣΠΗ) στη χρήση 
των αόριστων άρθρων "Η.Ε" (αρσενικός) και "une" (θηλυκός) με τα
απλά αντικείμενα τάξεων που χρησιμοποιούνται από τους μαθητές. 
Περιλαμβάνει τις ασκήσεις πρακτικής και αυτοαξιολόγησης με 
το ακουστικό στήριγμα.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Übung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grammatik</string>
          </keyword>
